location.name: Building A - Server Room
location.address:
1200 Corporate Drive
Building A, 3rd Floor
Denver, CO 80203
location.accessInstructions: Check in at main lobby security desk. Escort required to server room. Building access hours: 6 AM - 10 PM.

job.description: Server room CRAC unit not cooling. Temperature rising, currently at 82°F. Critical infrastructure at risk.
job.problemDescription: Customer reported CRAC unit stopped cooling around 6 PM yesterday. Unit is running but blowing warm air. No error codes displayed. Room temperature has risen from normal 68°F to 82°F.
job.specialInstructions: Critical system - minimize downtime. Coordinate with IT before powering off unit. Secondary portable cooling available if needed.
job.safetyNotes: High-voltage electrical. Lockout/tagout required. Refrigerant handling - EPA 608 certification required.

labor.description: Assisted with compressor replacement and refrigerant handling

workPerformed.summary: Diagnosed failed scroll compressor. Replaced compressor, contactor, and filter drier. Evacuated and recharged system with R-410A. System restored to normal operation.
details: Arrived on site 9:15 AM, met with site contact Mike Rodriguez
Initial diagnostics: compressor not starting, checked electrical - contactor welded closed
Compressor windings tested - shorted to ground, confirmed compressor failure
Coordinated with IT for 2-hour maintenance window
Recovered 22 lbs R-410A refrigerant (documented per EPA requirements)
Installed new scroll compressor and 40A contactor
Replaced filter drier as preventive measure
Pressure tested system at 500 PSI - no leaks detected
Charged system with 18 lbs R-410A per manufacturer spec
Started system - all operating parameters within normal range
Monitored for 45 minutes - room temperature dropped to 68°F
Cleaned work area and provided walkthrough to site contact
recommendations: Schedule preventive maintenance quarterly - unit is 5 years old
Consider backup portable cooling for future emergencies
Air filters should be replaced - currently at 60% capacity
deferredItems: Air filter replacement - customer will order and schedule separately

completion.resolution: Replaced failed compressor and related components. System restored to full operation. Server room temperature returned to normal 68°F operating range.
completion.followUpNotes: Schedule quarterly PM visit within 90 days. Customer to contact for filter replacement.

terms: Payment due within 30 days. Parts warranty: 1 year manufacturer warranty. Labor warranty: 90 days. Emergency service rates apply for after-hours calls. Full terms at summithvac.com/terms
